abstract: Coca-Cola is mulling a potential bid for Snapple, the iced tea division owned by Cadbury Schweppes which recently said it would seek a sale of the unit rather than a spinoff as part of an efficiency drive.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola is mulling a potential bid for Snapple, the iced tea division owned by Cadbury Schweppes which recently said it would seek a sale of the unit rather than a spinoff as part of an efficiency drive.
